replies.author: LittleHei
replies.txt_content: 度娘和谷歌娘一定会告诉你的

replies.author: yyh4616599
replies.txt_content:
左下角
打开New profile
Use version选择Use latest version
快照勾选Enable experimental development versions ("snapshots")一项
Use version选择Use latest version

replies.author: MM_Aurane
replies.txt_content:
我想说LZ的登陆器中版本为何如此之少？
设置好选项还有选好版本之后右下角【Save Profile】点击保存
登陆器链接：http://yun.baidu.com/s/1gdmWt6j

打开New profile
